# court

see KUR 𓉔 𓊖 𓈎 𓄿 𓆑 𒆳 𓈉

𒆤 GEᵈ 𓊀 gate < guard < court > 𒆤 KIT 𒆍 káᵗ 口 kǒu < house

𒆦 court 𓊖 in 𒆠𒁲𒀠 kiʳdiᵃˡ 𒂦𒆦 bad₃ kisal "courtyard"

𐀐𐀫 𐀯 𐀊 ke-ro-si-ja γερονσία (>γερουσία) council of elders (‘court, senate’)

𓈎 𓄿 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓊩 | high throne |

𓄤 𓆑 𓂋 𓏏 goods < court

𓍿 𓂋 𓇋 𓇋 𓏏 𓀢 | complaint | critique criticize critic… ⇔ •recurse 𓂋 𓍿 𓂋 𓏏 𓀢 @ court
𓏏 𓍯 𓄿 𓀢 | appeal to (someone) | •tragen beantragen drag / take @ court

𓍿 𓂋 𓀀 𓁐 𓏥 | (collective n.) man, men, mankind, Egyptians | courtship

𓈖𓇥𓂋𓏏𓀜 Nieder court "prison" Kerker 𓈖𓇥𓂋𓏏𓀜 incarceration 𓈖𓇥𓂋𓏏𓀜 underground 𓌨 <> necropolis

𒆠𒊩𒈠𒄷 main court of a temple
